CustomField.description: Measured in usage periods. If Credit Carryover = Pool, it represents the pool size. If Credit Carryover = Rolling, it represents the validity of the credits.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Measured in usage periods. If Credit Carryover = Pool, it represents the pool size. If Credit Carryover = Rolling, it represents the validity of the credits.
CustomField.label: Usage Term
